attributes.action: Legalise the use and growth of cannabis in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: This would boost the economy of the UK and provide a income for new businesses and would reduce crime rate in urban and rural areas as many violent acts are committed in relation to drug disputes
attributes.background: Allow the citizens of the UK to grow and use cannabis products at the age of 18

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legalise Cannabis Use and Sales for Adults over 18
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/735447
